QuestData.Title: Unholy Infusion
QuestData.Description: Before your weapon can reach its full potential it must be endowed with its signature powers. First among them is unholiness.$b$bYou must seek out and defeat the one called Professor Putricide, but his death is not your only goal. You must use his resources against him.$b$bFind a way to absorb his mutated slime. Use the foul substance to infuse your weapon with the power of the unholy. Only when this has been done shall I reveal your next task.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Infuse Shadow's Edge with Unholy power then slay Putricide.
QuestData.LogDescription: Highlord Darion Mograine wants you to infuse Shadow's Edge with Unholy power and slay Professor Putricide.$B$BThis quest may only be completed in 25 person difficulty of Icecrown Citadel.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $c.$b$bThe completion of our work draws near.
